name: test_tc_01_15_01_check_that_it_is_possible_to_vote_for_1_star
description:
The user is NOT logged in, located in the product card, section "Reviews"
        1. All required fields are filled with correct data
        2. Pressed 1 star
        3.The "Submit Review" button is pressed
        Result: Present in the DOM and visible on the page the message: "You submitted your review for moderation."
        This code works when run on Win, Mac, Ubuntu on a real laptop and has the features of working on GitHub Action.
        When interacting with the GitHub Action, it checks not for the text of the "Success" message, but for the "Success" URL"
descriptionHtml:
The user is NOT logged in, located in the product card, section "Reviews"
    1. All required fields are filled with correct data
    2. Pressed 1 star
    3.The "Submit Review" button is pressed
    Result: Present in the DOM and visible on the page the message: "You submitted your review for moderation."
    This code works when run on Win, Mac, Ubuntu on a real laptop and has the features of working on GitHub Action.
    When interacting with the GitHub Action, it checks not for the text of the "Success" message, but for the "Success" URL"

testStage.description:
The user is NOT logged in, located in the product card, section "Reviews"
        1. All required fields are filled with correct data
        2. Pressed 1 star
        3.The "Submit Review" button is pressed
        Result: Present in the DOM and visible on the page the message: "You submitted your review for moderation."
        This code works when run on Win, Mac, Ubuntu on a real laptop and has the features of working on GitHub Action.
        When interacting with the GitHub Action, it checks not for the text of the "Success" message, but for the "Success" URL"

steps.name: Move cursor to element. Perform a click action without navigating to a new page
Checking if 1 or more browser windows are open. If the 2nd is detected, then it returns to the 1st

items.statusDetails:
selenium.common.exceptions.ElementClickInterceptedException: Message: element click intercepted: Element <input type="text" name="title" id="summary_field" class="input-text" data-validate="{required:true}" data-bind="value: review().title" aria-required="true"> is not clickable at point (608, 861). Other element would receive the click: <fieldset class="field required review-field-ratings">...</fieldset>
